nodes.text: Task Force Token was one of five task forces of the New Republic Defense Fleet's Second Battle Group.

During the Black Fleet Crisis, Token was placed under the temporary command of the Fifth Battle Group, paired with Task Force Bellbright and led by Admiral Tolokus. It served in General Etahn A'baht's plan that culminated in Operation Strong Hand and was one of the last classes to join the Battle of N'zoth.
